Description: Emaar The Economic City (known as: Emaar) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since October 2006. Emaar operates within the Real Estate sector focusing on Real Estate Development. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. Emaar is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in September 2006.
